name: Peace Council
description:
Each zone has its own population, military, culture and industry.

The POWER of a country is the sum of all its zones' POWER .

The POWER of a zone = POP * CULTURE + MILITARY * INDUSTRY

=======================

PLAYER'S RESOURCE:

FUND, INFLUENCE are like money that can save to the next turn,

but AGENTS will always be full at the next turn.

=======================

NOTES:

- At each turn, random incidents will happen to stir things up.

- The capital always doubles the POWER of the zone.

- You can switch different view to see the heat map of population, military etc.

- War can only be declared between countries that are horizonally or vertically connected.

- This is an Jam Entry for LudumDare 50
